scripts.qc: node -e "require('datejs'); const dateTime = Date.today().setTimeToNow().toString('yyyyMMdd_HHmmss'); require('child_process').execSync(`cross-env NODE_ENV=qc mocha --timeout 0 ./tests_explorer/features/**/*.js --reporter mocha-multi-reporters --reporterOptions configFile=./config/configQC.json,cmrOutput=mocha-junit-reporter+testsuitesTitle+NamaScrum:mocha-junit-reporter+mochaFile+${dateTime}:mochawesome+reportFilename+${dateTime}`,{stdio: 'inherit'})"& cross-env NODE_ENV=qc node ./tests_explorer/utils/xml_data_time.js
